page.title: 15Wildlife - Amphibians
page.content: There are three species of local newt. The{crested newt,}dark-purplish brown with an orange belly, the{smooth newt, olive green, and the{palmate newt,} olive green with dark green under belly. The {common frog}is the only frog to be found in Wales.It hibernates in winter. It has many enemies including the heron, the otter and the grass snake. The {common toad}is the only toad found in Wales. Larger than the frog it does not leap but progresses by short jumps on all fours. Its warts secrete an offensive fluid when it is caught. The secretion offers no protection against the magpie, hedgehog and weasel.The toad is regarded as the most intelligent of all the amphibia.
